action.name: makeDebateQuestionSection
action.title: marks up the actual question text

action.name: makeDebateQuestionBlockSection
action.title: contains a question and related speeches

action.name: makeDebateMotionGroupSection
action.title: Create a Notices of Motion container

action.name: makeDebateMotionBlockSection
action.title: Create a Notice of Motion Section

action.name: markup_question_no
action.title: mark a block of text as a question reference

action.name: markup_question_by
action.title: mark a block of text as a question by reference

action.name: markup_question_to
action.title: mark a block of text as a question to reference

action.name: apply_questiontext_style
action.title: mark the selected text with a style

action.name: mark_house_closing
action.title: create a house closing time reference

action.name: section_creation
action.title: creates a section for the question block
